description: This file defines a custom Flutter app theme, including color scheme, text styles, and widget themes for UI consistency. It also includes a utility function for generating colors from hex strings and a header decoration method that uses theme colors.

methods.name: buildOceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Constructs a customized ThemeData object with specific color schemes, text themes, and component themes geared towards a modern, rounded, and subtle gradient style for a Flutter app.

methods.name: gradientHeaderDecoration
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with a top gradient for headers, utilizing theme's primary color with transparency.
